playlist.title: Ready to Learn
playlist.creator: OETA
playlist.annotation: Video developed to help parents and teachers guide the development of their children using the View-Read-Do triad paradigm

track.title: Ready to Learn
track.ov:subtitle: PBS Ready to Learn Learning Triange
track.annotation: Presenter Kerri Miles explains the fundamentals of the PBS Ready to Learn View-Read-Do triangle as a paradigm for learning.
